name: T.E.D (Transcend every dream)
description:
In T.E.D you play as the sandman, guardian of the nights whose mission is to protect 3 children trapped in dreams far too real to be truly safe there, as in a nightmare ...

T.E.D is a top down arcade shoot them up aimed at casual gamers where you must defend children from the nightmares that are coming at them. The player is locked on a circular path around said children, a path from which he’s able to shoot at the enemies, while also being able to rotate on himself 360°. Power-Ups that will give the player temporary boosts may appear on the circle during the game. The nightmares will come in waves from all directions to try to wake the children up or worse… When a child gets hit, he’s woken up.  Once the three of them are woken up you lose the game. The longer the player survives the better his final score.

This game was developed in 33 hours during a game jam.
